question: 虐待
partsOfSpeech: noun, する verb, の adjective
sourceMnemonic: If you can't <kanji>wait</kanji> to <kanji>oppress</kanji> people when you grow up, you're the kind of person who's prone to inflicting <vocabulary>abuse</vocabulary> on other people. You should try to correct that right away.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
